name: Arcanum Group Infor SyteLine ERP Suite
long_description:
Arcanum Group, Inc. is an IT Services Consulting firm based in Dallas, TX,
delivering professional services in 3 main practice areas: IT Operation Managed Services IT Leadership Consulting Collaboration / Business Intelligence Consulting Click the "see more" link for
the full profile or visit our website at http://www.2arcanum.com 1) IT Operation
Managed Services _ Managed services for turn-key outsourcing IT Ops of
organizations with between 10 and 250 desktop systems including all back-office
IT Ops support functions for help desk, server admin, network admin,
infrastructure, security and LOB systems support. Also provide add-on Operations
services to organizations with limited internal capacity to provide Escalation
Operations Support. 2) IT Leadership Consulting _ Provide _ Virtual CTO/CIO_—ù
consulting services to organizations with either internal or outsourced IT staff
(between 100 and 2000 desktop systems) which provides strategy
development/review and align IT Services with Business Operations. Report to
Board or specific organizational leadership (CEO/COO/CFO) for external
perspective to internal IT operations challenges with defined outputs of
recommendations and corrective action plans. Specific expertise in the following
areas: a. Implementation of ITIL / ITSM / Six Sigma / PMO Programs b. Help Desk
/ Field Support Team Management Turn-Around c. Infrastructure Deployment Project
Management (Start-up or Turn-Around) d. M&A IT Operations Integration 3)
Collaboration / Business Intelligence Consulting _ Provide either Turn-Key
services or Scoped Consulting Engagements on Collaboration and Business
Intelligence. Deep technical expertise around Intra- and Extra-Organizational
Collaboration including the following: a. Document Management / Controls b.
Content Management c. Business Process Automation / Workflow d. Datawarehousing
for Business Intelligence (Measure / Analysis)
